summary: Set four years after the first movie, Lin Xiao, Lily, Nan Xiang, and Ruby, confront opportunities and challenges as their school days come to an end.
cast: Mi Yang|Amber Kuo|Kai Ko|Rhydian Vaughan|Bea Hayden Kuo|Yi-Lin Sie|Cheney Chen|Shiping Cao|Carolyn Chen|Chao Jiang|Qinyun Jiang|Chen Li|Xinlong Li|Aaron C. Shang|Kiwi Shang|Lin Wang|Jingyao Yan|Jun Yao|Zimu Zhang|Zhu Zhen
title: Xiao shi dai 2: Qing mu shi dai
